description: Dashboard for detecting potential DNS data exfiltration

panels.title: Unusual DNS Query Volume
panels.search: index=* sourcetype=dns | stats count by src_ip | where count > 1000

panels.title: Long DNS Query Names
panels.search: index=* sourcetype=dns | eval query_length=len(query) | where query_length > 50 | table _time, src_ip, query, query_length
